name: Break The Loop (Titanelie)
description:
Break The Loop is a puzzle game made during a mini-gamejam with the keyword "Time Loop".

Read the instructions carefully and complete three puzzles to beat the game. The answers may not be as obvious as they seem...

CREDITS

I (Titanelie/Maja Bjørnaas Hoem), was:

  • Programmer
  • Designer

The music and art does not belong to me.
